named-query.name: User.findByNameAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from User as u where u.active = true and u.name = :name and u.password = :password

named-query.name: User.findActiveByName
named-query.query: select u from User as u where u.active = true and u.name = :name

named-query.name: User.findByName
named-query.query: select u from User as u where u.name = :name

named-query.name: User.findByEmail
named-query.query: select u from User as u where u.active = true and u.email = :email

named-query.name: User.findByNameAndCode
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.active = true and u.name = :name and u.activationCode = :code

named-query.name: User.findAll
named-query.query: select u from User u order by u.name

named-query.name: User.findAllActives
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.active = true order by u.name
